title: straw_mulch_applied_to_vegetable_bed_midday
summary: Straw mulch applied to vegetable beds during hot, low-humidity conditions.
description: Vegetable plants show signs of wilting during midday heat and low humidity. Straw mulch was applied to the soil surface as a mitigation action to reduce evaporation and protect plant roots. This record documents the condition and the corrective action taken under real-time environmental stress.
